section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:MaiLib.BPMChange
BPMChange note for Simai MaiLib.BPMChangesMaiLib.Chart
A class holding notes and information to form a chart MaiLib.ChartPack
Construct a collection to store charts in relate of SD and DX MaiLib.CompilerMaiLib.Hold
Constructs Hold Note MaiLib.IChart
Provide interface for charts MaiLib.ICompiler
Provide interface for Compilers MaiLib.INote
Provide interface and basic functions for Notes MaiLib.IParser
Provide interface for parsers MaiLib.ITokenizer
Intake files and tokenize MaiLib.Ma2
Implementation of chart in ma2 format MaiLib.Ma2Parser
Parses ma2 file into Ma2 chart format MaiLib.Ma2Tokenizer
Tokenizer of ma2 file MaiLib.MeasureChange
Defines measure change note that indicates a measure change in bar MaiLib.MeasureChanges
Store measure change notes in a chart MaiLib.Note
Basic note MaiLib.SimaiMaiLib.SimaiCompiler
Compile various Ma2 Charts MaiLib.SimaiParser
Parse charts in Simai format MaiLib.SimaiTokenizer
Tokenize input file into tokens that parser can read MaiLib.Slide
Construct a Slide note (With START!) MaiLib.TrackInformation
Use xml to store track information MaiLib.XMaiL
Using xml to store maicharts MaiLib.XmlInformation
Using Xml to store trackInformation
